fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An editorial about free TV licences for over-75s cited Sweden as being among countries with a similar licence fee model to the UK. Sweden replaced its TV and radio licence fee with a general public service fee on 1 January 2019 (Government rightly wants to give pensioners perks. It should pay for them, 15 June, page 2, Journal). • We misspelled the last name of the former Conservative party chair Grant Shapps, as Schapps (Johnson defensive and evasive but remains favourite for No 10, 19 June, page 9 turn from page 1).
